data.description:
In Wonders of the world you will visit the Colossus of Rhodes, Taj Mahal and Machu Picchu.

Travel to the island of Rhodes in the year 251 BCE, famous for the 108 foot statue of the Greek god Helios, known today as the Colossus of Rhodes! When you arrive you will assume the character Melissa of Delos, a priestess in the temple of Aphrodite.

The city is Agra, India in the year 1640. The construction of the Taj Mahal, is well under way. You will play the character of Kasim Kahn, an apprentice to Ismail, the head foreman overseeing the building of what will become one of the greatest buildings ever designed and constructed.

Travel thirty miles south of the South American Incan capital city of Cusco, Peru. The year is 1532 and two Incan brothers, Atahualpa and Huascar, have fought a civil war for control of the empire their father built. You are Anko, an administrator sent by the victor, Atahualpa, to assess the estate of the past emperor.

Explore and learn in wonders of the world!

changelog.change_log:
Wonders of the World 1.0.12 delivers bug fixes across the Oculus Go and GearVR platforms. The following is a list of the most relevant bugs fixed by our developers.

Fixed a bug that caused players to not be able to teleport while the menu was open
Fixed a bug that caused the map icon to turn green
Fixed the highlighted area of map in the tutorial
Fixed rotation of the player to avoid unwanted turns
Fixed bug that teleported the player below the tutorial area if they changed their height
Slowed down Nestor dialogue in the tutorial to make the conversation easier to follow
Fixed black texture on the first act of Machu Picchu
Fixed starting walk animation of Asiri in the first act
Removed static mesh glitch with canals in the first act of Machu Picchu
Fixed a bug that made the llama static mesh permanently highlighted
Fixed bug that stuck Asiri while explaining terraces
Fixed a bug that caused Asiri to repeat certain conversations in Machu Picchu
Fixed loud volume of conversations with Asiri in first and third act of Machu Picchu
Fixed up a missing roof in Intihuatana
Fixed stonewall static mesh, making it size properly when highlighted
Fixed two weird animation glitches of Asiri in the second and third act of Machu Picchu
Balanced audio cues that could not be heard in Machu Picchu act 3
Fixed Asiri gestures in Machu Picchu to make her dialogues flow more naturally
Fixed intro dialogue in Rhodes in order to to be accurate chronologically
Fixed spelling mistake in info items of Rhodes and mission lists
Fixed bug where if players stop highlight a statue in Rhodes it turns black
Fixed mute item descriptions when quickly selecting selecting multiple item info
Fixed static mesh glitch that would allow players to see below the ground in the Harbor
Fixed delays in specific conversations with Raymi and Claudio
Fixed texture glitch on Taj Mahal first act
Fixed audio glitches of Claudio in the first act
Fixed load time in the third act of Taj Mahal to allow game to render world properly
Fixed empty space in third act of Taj Mahal
Fixed items showing up on start
Added new developers to credits
Added new screenshots to the game store page

We hope you enjoy the newly updated version of the game and we look forward to your feedback in the review section!

- The Wonders of the World Team
